creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: very faded image; bald figure with large hoop earring, bushy eyebrows, and large halo in seated position wearing loose robe facing PR; attendant stands at figure's PL with hands clasped in front; long beard, green and gold robe; black hair tied up on top of head with red ribbon and crown
medium: Ink, color, and gold leaf on silk
title: Rakan with Attendant
